title: 87/168/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 February 1987 amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 February 87
amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
(87/168/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 86/473/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 February 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 12. 1977, p. 85.
(2) OJ No L 275, 26. 9. 1986, p. 36.
(3) OJ No L 279, 30. 9. 1986, p. 53.
ANNEX
LIST OF ESTABLISHMENTS FROM WHICH IMPORTS OF MEAT PRODUCTS MAY BE AUTHORIZED WITHOUT A TIME LIMIT
1.2.3 //  //  //  // Approval No   // Establishment  // Address  //  //  //  // 2 (1)   // Frigorífico Colonia  // Tarariras, Colonia   // 8 (2)   // Frigorífico Canelones  // Canelones, Canelones   //    //   //
(1) Frozen cooked bovine meat which is cooked to a centre temperature of at least 80 °C only.
(2) Fully heat treated canned bovine meat only.
LIST OF ESTABLISHMENTS FROM WHICH MEAT PRODUCTS MAY BE INTRODUCED INTO THE TERRITORY OF THE COMMUNITY ONLY UNTIL THE STATED DATE
1.2.3 //  //  //  // Approval No   // Establishment  // Address  //  //  //  // 35 (1) (2)   // Delta Brands Uruguay   // Pando, Canelones   //    //   //
(1) Fully heat treated canned bovine meat only.
(2) Until 31 July 1987.
